Posts.Content: Linda11111111 wrote: Hi! Planning a great trip to the British Isles and will be gone about a month. Just wondering what medical info you guys bring when you travel for an extended period. Will have my Faslodex shots right before I leave. Thank you! Surgery 1/1/2001 Lymph node removal: Right, Sentinel; Mastectomy: Right; Prophylactic mastectomy: Left Chemotherapy 2/1/2001 AC + T (Taxol) Hormonal Therapy 4/1/2010 Femara (letrozole) Dx 5/2010, IDC, 2cm, Stage IV, Grade 3, 3/12 nodes, mets, ER+/PR+, HER2- Hormonal Therapy 8/1/2013 Aromasin (exemestane), Faslodex (fulvestrant), Femara (letrozole) Chemotherapy 1/1/2015 Xeloda (capecitabine) Log in to post a reply
Posts.Title: Medical info when traveling out of the country? Linda11111111 petjunkie
